queries.query: SELECT l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) AS sum_qty , sum(l_extendedprice) AS sum_base_price , sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) AS sum_disc_price , sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) AS sum_charge , avg(l_quantity) AS avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) AS avg_price , avg(l_discount) AS avg_disc, count(*) AS count_order FROM alice_lineitem WHERE adddate(l_shipdate, INTERVAL 90 DAY) < str_to_date('1998-12-01', '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus ORDER BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus;

SELECT l_orderkey, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) AS revenue , o_orderdate, o_shippriority FROM bob_customer, bob_orders, alice_lineitem WHERE c_mktsegment = 'BUILDING' AND c_custkey = o_custkey AND l_orderkey = o_orderkey AND o_orderdate < '1995-03-15' AND l_shipdate > '1995-03-15' GROUP BY l_orderkey, o_orderdate, o_shippriority ORDER BY revenue, o_orderdate;

SELECT n_name, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) AS revenue FROM bob_customer, bob_orders, alice_lineitem, alice_supplier, alice_nation, alice_region WHERE c_custkey = o_custkey AND l_orderkey = o_orderkey AND l_suppkey = s_suppkey AND c_nationkey = s_nationkey AND s_nationkey = n_nationkey AND n_regionkey = r_regionkey AND r_name = 'ASIA' AND o_orderdate >= '1994-01-01' AND o_orderdate < adddate(str_to_date('1994-01-01', '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY n_name ORDER BY revenue;
